item.title: Comment on Another Friday assorted link(s) by Ha, ha
item.description:
Does it not embarrass the American right at all that *this* is their guy?

Not a ruthless, take-no-prisoners man of action like Putin, Erdogan or Modhi, or a committed ideologue like Truss, Milei, Bolsanaro or Le Pen.

This moron?
